name: World War 0x
storyline: Set during a World War 3 conflict, players choose to fight on the Axis or Allies on maps based on real world locations.
summary:
World War 0x is a browser-based play-to-earn, first person shooter game set during a World War 3 conflict.

Includes Zombie Survival mode. Try to survive against hordes of zombies with up to 4 players.

The game features real world locations such as Sydney Opera House, Stonehenge and Statue of Liberty.

Vehicles like tanks, armored cars and motorcycles help you get around fast. Jump straight into the battlefield!
